participant_1.background:
I am a farmer and my family is very supportive of my career.
i likw to go to the farmers markets to buy local veggies and fruits.
I am in my early 30s and identify as female.
i like anime shows.
my favorite holiday is halloween because i like dressing up.

participant_2.background:
I grew up in the Midwest, but now I live and work remotely from home in a small town in the mountains.
I remember my first purchase of a pickle jar.
I spent most of last year in my workshop, building furniture.
i play guitar on my free time.
i like katy perry as a musician.

content.text: Hey! I'm a farmer. What do you do for work?
I'm a professional musician! I play guitar and sing in a band.
That's awesome! Do you get to travel a lot?
Not as much as I'd like, but we do a few festivals and tours each year.
That sounds really fun! I'm in the early stages of starting my own farm.
That's awesome! Good luck with that!
Thanks! What's your favorite song to play?
I love playing "Firework" by Katy Perry.
That's a good one! I like to sing that one in the shower.
That's great! What's your favorite holiday?
My favorite holiday is Halloween! I love dressing up and going to parties.
That's awesome! I like Halloween too. I love carving pumpkins and watching horror movies.
Me too! I love watching horror movies on Halloween. Do you have any plans for this year?
Not yet, but I'm sure I'll come up with something!
